description: This file defines dependencies for a FastAPI backend, including user authentication and pagination utilities. It contains functions to extract the current user from a Bearer token, validate user activity, and compute pagination parameters.

methods.name: User get_current_user(token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Dependency that extracts and validates the current user from a Bearer token using OAuth2 scheme.

methods.name: User get_current_active_user(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Ensures that the current user is active, raising an exception if not.

methods.name: tuple[int,int] pagination_params(page: Optional[int] = 1, page_size: Optional[int] = 20)
methods.description: Converts page and page_size query parameters into offset and limit for pagination.

ctags.name: get_current_user
ctags.pattern: /^def get_current_user(token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> User/

ctags.name: pagination_params
ctags.pattern: /^def pagination_params(page: Optional[int] = 1, page_size: Optional[int] = 20) -> tuple[int, int]/
